title: Screaming Carrots
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, Fusion
description: A contemporary vegan restaurant, est. Jan 2016 and is near the I-95. Features a white decor and metal shined floor plus an open kitchen. Serves organic, wholefood cuisine specializing in Mediterranean and South East Asian cuisines with lots of flavor and aroma. All dishes are freshly made daily.
